arts.ttl: Kyle Walker’s fall is the symbol of Man City decline
arts.sum: The days of ‘you’ll never beat Kyle Walker’ chants have passed and City’s long-serving right-back is now on the brink of leaving the club as a symbol of all that has gone wrong

arts.ttl: Liverpool injury, suspension list and return dates for Brentford: Joe Gomez latest
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up all of Liverpool's latest injury and suspension news ahead of Saturday's Premier League clash with Brentford.

arts.ttl: Brentford star sends clear message to Liverpool after thrilling comeback to stun Man City
arts.sum: Brentford came from two goals down in the final 10 minutes to snatch a 2-2 draw with Manchester City on Tuesday, giving them confidence ahead of Saturday's game against Liverpool

arts.ttl: Kyle Walker makes transfer preference clear after being left out by Man City again
arts.sum: Kyle Walker has made it clear he wants to leave Manchester City but will only make a January move if he can continue playing at an elite club with England still central to his ambitions

arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola knows where Man City have to improve after Brentford
arts.sum: Manchester City should have been home and dry in their Premier League game with Brentford but threw away another result

arts.ttl: I saw Pep Guardiola's reaction that showed Man City got sucked into Brentford trap
arts.sum: Manchester City threw away a two-goal lead at the Gtech Community Stadium as their revival came to a shuddering halt against Brentford.

arts.ttl: Man City have got £63m transfer priority right after late Brentford collapse
arts.sum: Manchester City threw away a two-goal lead at Brentford to surrender a couple of points and kill off any possiblity of getting back into the title race.

arts.ttl: Emotional Pep Guardiola rages at goalkeeper Stefan Ortega in bizarre embrace after Man City blew a two-goal lead one day after manager's 'split with wife' was revealed
arts.sum: Post-match, Guardiola was snapped in a bizarre embrace with his goalkeeper, Ortega, as he appeared angered by what had transpired, though continued to hug the German.

arts.ttl: Brentford 2-2 Man City: Pep Guardiola berates stars as City throw away two-goal lead
arts.sum: City’s short-lived revival came to an end on Tuesday night

arts.ttl: Phil Foden makes worrying admission after Man City throw away two-goal lead at Brentford
arts.sum: Phil Foden blamed Manchester City's fitness as they struggled to contain Brentford in the final half hour as the Bees came from 2-0 down to secure a point on Tuesday
